issue.title: Building VRCPlugin.so from source results in much larger .so

content.raw: ~~I believe the 10% performance hit is from the increase in ode solver iterations from 50 to 100. This is done to improve atlas v5 walking stability.~~  Actually no, if you're already on 4.2.3 (source or deb) then you have the same physics settings.
content.html: I believe the 10% performance hit is from the increase in ode solver iterations from 50 to 100. This is done to improve atlas v5 walking stability. Actually no, if you're already on 4.2.3 (source or deb) then you have the same physics settings.
